item.title: containers: what are they?
item.description: You might’ve heard about “containerization,” or about Docker, or Kubernetes, or various other pieces of software. It’s a really neat technology, but it’s also become somewhat of a buzzword. As someone who uses containers on a regular basis, I don’t believe that everyone can benefit from containers. However, I believe everyone can benefit from knowing what containers are. What are containers? Containers are a way of running services. This is really the most important aspect to understand.

item.title: page0
item.description: And so it begins. page0 page0 is the first page. I guess that technically means there are negative pages, but those aren’t up on this site (yet?). Technical This site is yet another iteration of my personal blog. It’s currently based on the base16 hugo theme. There will likely be more details on the hardware and software in the future, but for now, this is a simple test page only.
